thread.title: Teresa Ann Brown
thread.title_full: Extra Space Storage reviewed by Teresa Ann Brown

author: Teresa Ann Brown
title: Teresa Ann Brown
text: I would recommend the DeZavala location of Extra Space Storage in San Antonio, TX to anyone. The employees are super helpful, facility is sparkling clean and the hours of operation work perfectly for people that are traveling long distances to initially store their precious possessions. Great job Extra Space Storage!!
